tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: This was my third class to take with Ms. Vaughan.. I love her! I took Intro to Teaching online. You have to do 30 hours of observation in one classroom as well as two service projects and other homework. If you haven\'t taken Ms. Vaughan in class I wouldn\'t recommend starting out taking her online. She is much better at explaining in person.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Love Ms Vaughan! In this class you have to do 6 hrs of observations but if you ever need help she will help you! She used to be a kindergarten teacher and principal so she knows what she\'s talking about!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Super fantastic teacher. I\'ve had four classes with her. She does have favorites, but really she just expects you to do your work and follow her rules for observations. Homework is super easy. Observations just require you to go to the school, observe correctly, and present it. Have confidence! :)

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I love Ms. Vaughan. She is very willing to work with her students outside of class, unlike most teachers at ASUB. If you can\'t afford a book, you better make friends with someone in your class so you can do homework and read in class. There\'s a lot of nonsense work, but what she teaches is relavent and you\'ll remember it!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: So glad I had her as a teacher, I learned so much! :)

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Can\'t ask for a better teacher! She expects a lot from her students, but if you are serious about becoming a teacher, this is the class to take. You will learn a lot. She gives a ton of homework and you will have observations, so be ready to work. I would not suggest taking more than one of her classes at a time. You WILL need a book!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I have had Mrs. Vaughan for both child dev & survery of early childhood, she is an awesome woman with a big heart. she loves to teach-so be ready to learn! you must have the book to pass. she gives some busywork & observations. overall the class is fun & you really will learn if you take her. i even learned a life lesson or two..TAKE VAUGHAN!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Mrs. Vaughan is a VERY helpful teacher. Yes, she does expect a lot, but if you keep up with the work, there is no reason you shouldn\'t get an A or a B. I wouldn\'t recommend taking more than 1 or 2 of her classes per semester. She loves her job and her students, and she\'s very passionate about teaching! I don\'t regret taking her classes one bit.
